items.content_html: 一个javascript组件库，提供基本的联系我、登录、注册、搜索和邮件订阅之类的弹窗组件（无需写html+css），拿来即用 A lightweight javascript library to create some modal windows without html and css like `contact me`、`search`、`login`、`sign up` and `email subscribe` etc.
